description: A trusted technician is given rare clearance and confronted with the dual protocols—one for participatory power, one for restoration of the disappeared—while reflecting on recent community conversations.
The participatory protocol is activated, reconfiguring city scoring to reward those engaging in open forums and real-time decision-making. Conventional power brokers lose influence overnight.
Unexpected grassroots leaders and engaged residents receive sudden access to city governance, sparking confusion and spontaneous reorganization.
